comments: McDaniels (MIN) is moving alongside Bufkin's (ATL) path and marginal body contact occurs as Bufkin moves around him during his drive to the basket.
Gobert (MIN) brushes Bufkin's (ATL) right shoulder contesting his driving shot attempt.
Conley (MIN) is the last player to touch the ball before it goes out of bounds.
Gobert (MIN) maintains a legal guarding position during Fernando's (ATL) shot attempt in the post.
Bufkin (ATL) places a hand on Edwards' (MIN) body as he defends him in the post and the contact is marginal.
Gobert (MIN) briefly grasps Fernando's (ATL) jersey before deflecting the throw-in.
Krejci (ATL) establishes himself in the frontcourt before he receives the pass.
Anderson (MIN) reaches in and makes clean contact with the ball and any contact with Krejci (ATL) is incidental.

call_type: Turnover: Lost Ball Out of Bounds
comments: Replay review of the out of bounds called on Krejci (ATL) pursuant to a coach's challenge was deemed successful. Krejci is the last person to touch the ball before it goes out of bounds and MIN is correctly given the possession.
Gueye (ATL) reaches in and initiates contact with Edwards' (MIN) wrist, causing him to lose control of the ball.
Bufkin (ATL) commits a take foul on Edwards (MIN).
Bufkin (ATL) deflects the ball out of bounds.
Bufkin (ATL) commits a take foul on Edwards (MIN).
Edwards (MIN) place a hand against Krejci's (ATL) body and removes it without applying force as Krejci enters his jump shooting motion.
Gueye (ATL) and Anderson (MIN) mutually engage and disengage during the rebound.
Gueye (ATL) commits a take foul on Gobert (MIN).
Gobert (MIN) collapses his forearm against Krejci (ATL) before cleanly blocking the shot attempt.
McDaniels (MIN) trails behind Bufkin (ATL), who extends his leg backwards and creates the marginal contact.
Krejci (ATL) commits a take foul on Anderson (MIN).
